title: Bike lanes actually don’t cause pollution, contrary to what a California Assemblymember says – Urbanist Update
content:
Bike lanes don't cause traffic, a 100-mile path between Austin and San Antonio, slowing down bikes, and more.

Read the full article at Bike lanes actually don’t cause pollution, contrary to what a California Assemblymember says – Urbanist Update on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
